subject: Football
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Deion Sanders will be enshrined in Canton, Ohio, along with Marshall Faulk, Shannon Sharpe, Richard Dent and Ed Sabol, founder of N.F.L. Films.
snippet: Deion Sanders will be enshrined in Canton, Ohio, along with Marshall Faulk, Shannon Sharpe, Richard Dent and Ed Sabol, founder of N.F.L. Films.
